actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to change the customs treatment of certain woven fabrics of wool if products of an insular possession of the United States but further processing.

summary.text: Revises the customs treatment of specified woven fabrics of wool if they are products of an insular possession of the United States but are imported into such possession as fabric for further processing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to change the customs treatment of certain woven fabrics of wool if products of an insular possession of the United States but further processing.
